"We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer in a statement. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. Satya Nadella has been at Microsoft for 19 years and most recently led the engineering efforts in the Online Services Division, which includes overseeing the technical strategy for one of the largest cloud infrastructures in the world,

Interestingly, David Letterman also took a shot at Fox News in his Top 10 list as can be seen with the# 2 item on his list Hoping his intolerance and thuggish behavior will land him a job at Fox News. Fox News has gained a reputation for hiring a number of former members of the Bush administration including Karl Rove . David Letterman 's verbal jab was a likely reference to these hires. TIM BALE, PROFESSOR OF POLITICS, UNIVERSITY OF SUSSEX It's obviously damaging because Andy Coulson was a very effective media operator so he is losing someone who was incredibly useful to the David Cameron operation. It is also incredibly damaging because it questions Mr David Cameron 's judgment and that for a politician is one of the worst things you can possibly do. Being a politician is all about... picking the right people to do the right job and the decision to appoint Andy Coulson was controversial in the first place and it's clearly a big, big judgment call that David Cameron has got wrong. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to assume more of a behind-the-scenes role as much as Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Addressing charges that he failed to provide enough troops for the Iraq war, the former defense chief wrote: In retrospect, there may have been times when more troops could have helped. But Donald Rumsfeld insists that if Jon Huntsman military officers had reservations about the size of the invading force, they never informed him, the Post said. Yesterday, in responding to a question... SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans. "Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern," CEO Sergio Marchionne
